对机械敏感AGPCR及其在生物过程和疾病中的作用的见解这种新发表的基因和疾病分析阐明了机械敏感性G蛋白偶联受体（AGPCR）在调节生物学过程及其在各种疾病中的影响中的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/insights-into-mechanosensistive-agpcrs-and-their-role--role-in-biole-in-biologic-in-biological-in-biological-processes-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/insights-into-mechanosensistive-agpcrs-and-their-their-role-in-biole-in-biologic-in-biological-inbiological-processes-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ba49ad3-e90e-417C-9A55-4D8F784AAA118 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 20:21:53 -0500 Insights into mechanosensitive aGPCRs and their role in biological processes and disease
研究阐明了纤维辅助祖细胞在肌肉再生和变性中的作用最近的一项研究为纤维辅助祖细胞（FAP）在肌肉再生，纤维化和变性中的作用提供了新的启示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/study-sheds-light-on-the-the-the-the-the---fibro-fibro-fibro-achipogenic-progenitors-in-muscle-rencle-reneration-reneration-and-degeneration and-degeneration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/study-sheds-light-on-the-the-the-the-the----fibro-fibro-fibro-fibo-------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d81af03a-3d07-49a8-a014-cebaf67e80a5 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 20:17:24 -0500 Study sheds light on the role of fibro-adipogenic progenitors in muscle regeneration and degeneration
了解星形细胞G蛋白偶联受体在物质使用疾病中的作用最近发表在工程上的一项研究研究了药物成瘾的复杂机制，突出了星形细胞G蛋白偶联受体（GPCR）的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/dunderstanding-the-the------- of-astrocytic-g-pretein-coupleped-coupled-recpled-recpeptors-in-substance-substance-use-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/understanding-the-the-the------- of-astrocytic-g-pretein-coupleped-coupled-recpled-recpeptors-in-substance-substance-suseders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=511FFB40-40-4F52-40BC-A3DE-3EBAE871BF63 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 20:07:51 -0500 Understanding the role of astrocytic G protein-coupled receptors in substance-use disorders
巨噬细胞靶向疗法可以增强心脏再生和心肌修复在基因与疾病中发表的一项新评论重点介绍了巨噬细胞靶向的疗法，这是心脏再生和心肌修复的有前途的前沿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/macrophage-targeted-therapy-therapy-could-enhance-cardiac-cardiac-regeneration-and-regeneration-and-mycardial-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/macrophage-targeted-therapy-therapy-could-enhance-cardiac-cardiac-regeneration-and-regeneration-and-mycardial-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75A199E1-57EB-40D8-9240-F027B5901052 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 19:56:02 -0500 Macrophage-targeted therapy could enhance cardiac regeneration and myocardial repair
探索癌症进展中非编码RNA与氧化应激之间的关系基因与疾病发表的一篇新评论文章探讨了非编码RNA与氧化应激之间的复杂关系，从而使促进肿瘤发育的机制开发了新的启示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/exploring-the-relationship-bet--non-non-coding-rnas-and-xidative ard-oxiDative surstrasser-in-cancer-in-cancer-in-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/expleor-the-relationship-bet-non-non-coding-rnas-rnas-and-xidative surstress in-cancer-in-cancer-in-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3da4315b-46b5-46b5-48aa-8b31-8b31-ef0183b226 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 19:52:26 -0500 Exploring the relationship between non-coding RNAs and oxidative stress in cancer progression
新药VIP36在治疗疼痛而没有有害副作用的情况下显示出希望由国立卫生研究院（NIH）资助的研究团队开发了一种药物，显示出治疗急性和慢性疼痛的希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-drug-vip36-shows-promise-promise-in-worteating-pain-without-without-without-without-side-fefts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-drug-vip36-shows-promise-promise-in-woreating-pain-without-without-without-without-side-fellefts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a6f7c59-f474-4d78-bd8c-ba66e01d05f1 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 12:40:40 -0500 New drug VIP36 shows promise in treating pain without harmful side effects
残疾患者面临不尊重医疗保健提供者根据宾夕法尼亚大学佩雷​​尔曼医学院的新研究，残疾患者不太可能对医疗保健工作者进行尊重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/patients-with-disabilities-face-dispect-from-health-health-care-providers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/patients-with-disabilities-face-face-dispect-from-health-health-care-providers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B582397C-59A1-469B-B185-195EA55D00F8 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 12:32:35 -0500 Patients with disabilities face disrespect from health care providers
研究揭露了电子烟支持戒烟的信念赫伯特·沃特海姆公共卫生和人类长寿科学学院和加利福尼亚大学圣地亚哥分校的摩尔癌中心的研究人员发现，在美国的吸烟者中，电子烟的使用不会增加戒烟，并且实际上与减少烟草的戒烟有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/research-debunks-belief-that-e-cigarettes-support-support-smoking-cessation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/research-debunks-belief-that-e-cigarettes-support-support-smoking-cessation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f401A3C-F8F6-4591-9EE7-11403852A52E Wed, 05 Mar 2025 12:21:10 -0500 Research debunks belief that e-cigarettes support smoking cessation
贝克曼·库尔特（Beckman Coulter）生命科学和稀有生物科学AB合作伙伴关系将分子研究带来流式细胞术稀有生物科学的创新SuperRCA技术增强了流式细胞术，扩大肿瘤学研究可能性并改善突变检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/beckman-coulter-life-sciences-and-and-rarity-bioscience-bioscience-ab-partnership-brings-brings-molecular-molecular-research-to to to-flow-cytometry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/beckman-coulter-life-sciences-and-and-rarity-bioscience-bioscience-ab-partnership-brings-brings-molecular-molecular-crearch-to to-flow-cytometry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AF4A2EEA-8EB0-4B3A-8B92-BA31870D9659 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 12:16:00 -0500 Beckman Coulter Life Sciences and Rarity Bioscience AB Partnership Brings Molecular Research to Flow Cytometry
tau蛋白清除的新方法为阿尔茨海默氏症的治疗带来了希望在一项涉及小鼠和实验室种植的人类“迷你脑”的研究中，USC干细胞科学家发现了一种释放有毒tau蛋白细胞的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-appleact-to-tau-protein-cleotein-clearance-verners-hope-for-alzheimers-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250305/new-pablecreach-to-tau-protein-cleotein-clearance-verners-hope-for-alzheimers-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bff7b8ba-0201-4FAA-9179-6FBBB8E156BE7 Wed, 05 Mar 2025 12:13:06 -0500 New approach to tau protein clearance offers hope for Alzheimer's treatment
